code: import R from"ramda";var initialState={};export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"FETCH_CATEGORIES_SUCCESS":var newVal=R.indexBy(R.prop("id"),action.payload);return R.merge(state,newVal);default:return state;}});
